name: Cursed Date!
description:
Welcome to 'Cursed Date', a rhythm-based dating sim where your responses, and the night, are spiralling out of control! Use the arrow keys to select the best answers, before the terrible curse inflicted on you by a malicious musical mage forces you to say something to each note of the melody. Can you overcome this melodic malignancy and avoid upsetting your date, or are you doomed to succumb to a terrible curse?

Programming: Martin Grønbech
Sound: Christopher Reynolds
Art: Claire Crawford
